Name: Knightboo
Desc: My steed and I can both bounce to accelerate!

1.Name: Knight, Charge Up!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Jump repeatedly while riding Pale Bouncy and summon 3 <color=#FFFFFF>Knight's Stars</color>. When characters come into contact with <color=#FFFFFF>Knight's Stars</color>, they recover Energy.

2.Name: Knight, Charge Up!
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>

1.Name: Knight's Chivalry
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least one <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character in your squad: When characters come into contact with <color=#FFFFFF>Knight's Stars</color>, their ATK increases by 20 + Bangboo level × 1.2 for 10s.

2.Name: Knight's Chivalry
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there is at least one <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character in your squad: When characters come into contact with <color=#FFFFFF>Knight's Stars</color>, their ATK increases by 25 + Bangboo level × 1.4 for 10s.

1.Name: Knight, Bouncing Charge!
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Summons 3 Pale Bouncys which stomp up to 10 times in the area ahead, each time dealing <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> to enemies within its attack range.
